Package gui

Class NotificationsFrameController

java.lang.Object
gui.NotificationsFrameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
public class NotificationsFrameController extends Object implements IController
Controller class for the Notifications Frame UI. Manages the display and behavior of notifications in the ListView.

    • initializeFrame

      public void initializeFrame()
      Initializes the notifications frame. Sets up the ListView and loads the notifications.
      Specified by:
      initializeFrame in interface IController

    • refreshNotifications

      public void refreshNotifications()
      Refreshes the notifications displayed in the ListView. Retrieves notifications from the server and updates the ListView with the latest data.
